PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2001-00222001-01-090,  ,  TC,  ,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the MOTOR VEHICLE SAFETY REGULATIONS (LIGHT VEHICLE BRAKE SYSTEMS) to the extent that, effective April 1, 2001, vehicles fitted with an electric brake system would be required to meet the same braking performance standards as passenger cars, and all other light vehicles (3,500 kg or less), which includes almost all minivans and sport-utility vehicles, would be required to meet those standards by September 1, 2002.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2001-0035 Publication Date: 2001-01-31
Attachments
